      • getState

        public RepositoryItem.State getState()
        Description copied from interface: RepositoryItem
        Returns the state of the RepositoryItem.
        Specified by:
        getState in interface RepositoryItem
        Returns:
        NEW when the item has been just created and has no binary content yet. CONTENT when the item has binary content and can be read.

      • checkState

      • createRepositoryHttpPlayer

        public RepositoryHttpPlayer createRepositoryHttpPlayer()
        Description copied from interface: RepositoryItem
        Returns the RepositoryHttpPlayer to download the contents of the item using http protocol. This operation is only valid when the item is in STORED state.
        Specified by:
        createRepositoryHttpPlayer in interface RepositoryItem
        Returns:
        A player to download the item via HTTP

      • createRepositoryHttpPlayer

        public RepositoryHttpPlayer createRepositoryHttpPlayer(java.lang.String sessionIdInUrl)
        Description copied from interface: RepositoryItem
        Returns the RepositoryHttpPlayer to download the contents of the item using http protocol. This operation is only valid when the item is in STORED state. The parameter sessionIdInURL allows to specify the sessionId of this player used to construct the URL. The complete URL of the player can be obtained using the RepositoryHttpEndpoint.getURL() in the returned object.
        Specified by:
        createRepositoryHttpPlayer in interface RepositoryItem
        Parameters:
        sessionIdInUrl - The sessionId of this player used to construct the URL.
        Returns:
        A player to download the item via HTTP

      • createRepositoryHttpRecorder

        public RepositoryHttpRecorder createRepositoryHttpRecorder()
        Description copied from interface: RepositoryItem
        Returns the RepositoryHttpRecorder to upload the contents of the item using http protocol. This operation is only valid when the item is in NEW state. When the element is used using the provided URL, the state of the item is changed to STORING.
        Specified by:
        createRepositoryHttpRecorder in interface RepositoryItem
        Returns:
        A recorder to upload to the item via HTTP

      • createRepositoryHttpRecorder

        public RepositoryHttpRecorder createRepositoryHttpRecorder(java.lang.String sessionIdInUrl)
        Description copied from interface: RepositoryItem
        Returns the RepositoryHttpRecorder to upload the contents of the item using http protocol. This operation is only valid when the item is in NEW state. When the element is used using the provided URL, the state of the item is changed to STORING. The parameter sessionIdInURL allows to specify the sessionId of this recorder used to construct the URL. The complete URL of the recorder can be obtained using the RepositoryHttpEndpoint.getURL() in the returned object.
        Specified by:
        createRepositoryHttpRecorder in interface RepositoryItem
        Parameters:
        sessionIdInUrl - The sessionId of this player used to construct the URL.
        Returns:
        A recorder to upload to the item via HTTP

      • getAttributes

        public RepositoryItemAttributes getAttributes()
        Description copied from interface: RepositoryItem
        Returns the attributes associated with this RepositoryItem. This attributes are used mainly when serving this item by means of http endpoint.
        Specified by:
        getAttributes in interface RepositoryItem
        Returns:
        The metainformation attributes of the item
